mapper.insert: insert into user (id, phone_number, name, head_protrait, address, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headProtrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_protrait = #{headProtrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, phone_number, name, head_protrait, address, create_time, update_time from user
